form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Gallego (for himself and Mr. Young) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on qualified first-time homebuyer distributions, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Uplifting First-Time Homebuyers Act of 2025.

section.header: Increasing the limitation on qualified first-time homebuyer distributions

subsection.text: Section 72(t)(8)(B)(i) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking $10,000 and inserting $50,000.
The amendment made by this Act shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
